author: drkovalskyi
body:
#### PR description:

We have reduced event size of BPHNano to 3.5kB/event from 11.5kB/event using 50,000 events from Run2024I. On a signal MC sample, it's 2.6kB/event. The previous estimate of 8kB/event was made with low pileup events by chance. The reduction was achieved by  
- reducing the precision to 10 mantissa bits for all floats by default  
- for tracks and ditracks, the precision is reduced to 6 bits (0.5% std error)  
- storing only ditracks that are part of the B-candidates

#### PR validation:

- ran a few tests on data and MC. Changes are minor, so it should be sufficient  
- code-checks and code-format

@gmelachr, @abragagn, @sarafiorendi, please check the precision and let me know if it's too low. We should be able to afford a few exceptions.
title: BPHNano size reduction
